name: Kid N' Kookies
description: A cross of Girl Scout Cookies (Forum cut) and Snowman OG, Kid N’ Kookies by Kid N' Blaze is a collaboration between Fresno, CA breeders Loud Seeds, and Christopher “Kid” Reid, better known as one half of the famous ‘90s rap duo “Kid n’ Play.” As a potent indica-dominant hybrid testing at over 22% THC, Kid N’ Kookies has a heavy, sedating high that can provide relief from pain, nausea, migraines, and insomnia. The flavor is much like the “cookie” taste of GSC with undertones of pine.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Tingly, Giggly, Hungry, Headaches, Insomnia, Pain, Depression, Stress, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Paranoid, Anxious
